Sharks great Paul Gallen says the NRL shouldn't be "gagging" players after Cronulla forward Toby Rudolf copped a formal warning over comments made in a post-match interview.

articles.title: Shock twist in Hasler’s Sea Eagles contract saga - Fox Sports
articles.description: There has been a shock development in the long-running contract standoff between Manly and coach Des Hasler.
articles.content:
Channel 9 reporter Danny Weidler had stated Hasler would this week ink a new two-year deal that would keep him on the northern beaches until the end of 2023.
